nodes.name: Shiqi Liu
nodes.content: I am a first-year Ph.D. student at [Safe AI Lab](https://safeai-lab.github.io/) at Carnegie Mellon University (CMU) advised by Prof. [Ding Zhao](https://www.meche.engineering.cmu.edu/directory/bios/zhao-ding.html) Previously, I earned a master's degree in Mechanical Engineering from CMU. My current research interests include Reinforcement Learning and Geometric Learning in the context of Robotics.

nodes.title: Creative Robot Tool Use with Large Language Models
nodes.authors: Mengdi Xu*, Peide Huang*, Wenhao Yu*, Shiqi Liu, Xilun Zhang, Yaru Niu, Tingnan Zhang, Fei Xia, Jie Tan, Ding Zhao
nodes.journals: CoRL 2023 Workshop on Language and Robot Learning: Language as Grounding

nodes.title: Automated Cardiovascular Record Retrieval by Multimodal Learning between Electrocardiogram and Clinical Report
nodes.authors: Jielin Qiu*, Jiacheng Zhu*, Shiqi Liu, William Han, Jingqi Zhang, Chaojing Duan, Michael Rosenberg, Emerson Liu, Douglas Weber, Ding Zhao
nodes.journals: Proceedings of Machine Learning for Health (PMLR), 2023

nodes.title: Continual Vision-based Reinforcement Learning with Group Symmetries
nodes.authors: Shiqi Liu*, Mengdi Xu*, Peide Huang, Xilun Zhang, Yongkang Liu, Kentaro Oguchi, Ding Zhao

nodes.title: What Went Wrong? Closing the Sim-to-Real Gap via Differentiable Causal Discovery
nodes.authors: Peide Huang, Xilun Zhang*, Ziang Cao*, Shiqi Liu*, Mengdi Xu, Wenhao Ding, Jonathan Francis, Bingqing Chen, Ding Zhao

nodes.title: SeasonDepth: Cross-Season Monocular Depth Prediction Dataset and Benchmark under Multiple Environments
nodes.authors: Hanjiang Hu*, Baoquan Yang*, Zhijian Qiao*, Shiqi Liu, Jiacheng Zhu, Zuxin Liu, Wenhao Ding, Ding Zhao, Hesheng Wang
nodes.journals: International Conference on Intelligent Robots and Systems (IROS) 2023, in adjunct with ICML 2022 Safe Learning for Autonomous Driving Workshop

nodes.title: Online AprilTag Generator
nodes.descriptions: A simple, easy-to-use AprilTag generator that creates multiple tags in a single PDF file. Ideal for object detection, pose estimation, and camera calibration.

nodes.content: One paper about [cardiovascular record retrieval](https://arxiv.org/abs/2304.06286) was accepted by PMLR ML4H 2023.
Two papers got accepted to CoRL 2023, and [COVERS](https://sites.google.com/view/rl-covers/) was accepted for an **oral presentation**!
One paper about [cross-domain robust perception](https://arxiv.org/abs/2011.04408) got accepted to IROS 2023.
